name: User Network Interface (UNI) Activity Indicator
title: UACT
definition: Identifies the activity that is taking place at this UNI/ENNI termination point.
validEntryNotes: Valid entry of “K” is not permitted on initial issuance of request. An entry of “K” will indicate that all LOS activity associated with this UNI/ENNI termination is also cancelled.
Use of “C” versus “D” and “N” activity is based on provider/tariffs/contracts/negotiations.
usageNotes: Required when the associated UREF field is populated, otherwise prohibited.
